reviewSummary.negative: Customers are upset about being asked to vacate their table early, before the agreed reservation time. They felt their dining experience was rushed and poorly managed.

weaknesses: Price range may not align with more budget-conscious customers ($$$), potentially limiting the customer base.
Operational management issues, such as understaffing and being occasionally overwhelmed by reservations, leading to negative customer experiences related to service.
Thematic and food experience inconsistency, as satisfaction is dependent on the specific theme or chef of the day.
